attributes.action: Not Step Down as Prime Minister!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is nobody else to do the job any better than Tony Blair. Maybe Gordon Brown will hope to became half of Blair, but 'Dave' Cameron is just a 'lesser clone' of Tony Blair. Blair is the best Prime Minister at present. You cannot tell anything about a Politician through his/her policies, but only by his/her character. Gordon Brown has the character, but Blair is still better.
